title: How to Catch Xerneas and Yveltal in Pokémon X and Y

steps.title: Get the game which has the legendary you want.
steps.content: Get the game which has the legendary you want. You get Xerneas in Pokémon X, and Yveltal in Pokémon Y.

steps.title: Get to the point where you get the Psychic Badge.
steps.content: Get to the point where you get the Psychic Badge. You get it by beating the Anistar City Gym.

steps.title: Go to Lumiose City.
steps.content: Go to Lumiose City. If you have a Pokémon with Fly, use that to get there quickly.

steps.title: Go to the Lysandre Café, which is located on Vernal Avenue.
steps.content: Go to the Lysandre Café, which is located on Vernal Avenue. You'll find two Team Flare Grunts disguising as a waiter and waitress there; beat them and they'll reveal the password to enter the Lysandre Labs. Enter the Lysandre Labs by speaking to the cupboard near the waitress.

steps.title: Go through the Lysandre Labs, which has arrow tile puzzles which send you in specific directions and teleporters, until you get to B3F.
steps.content: Go through the Lysandre Labs, which has arrow tile puzzles which send you in specific directions and teleporters, until you get to B3F. Battle the Team Flare member there. After you beat him, he'll activate a weapon located in Geosenge Town.

steps.title: Go to Geosenge Town and go into Team Flare's headquarters, located northwest of town.
steps.content: Go to Geosenge Town and go into Team Flare's headquarters, located northwest of town. Inside, you'll battle a bunch of Team Flare members. After you beat them, you'll free Xerneas/Yveltal. Go up to it to battle it.
